dct_description_sm: American, Soviet, British, and French occupation areas shown. Includes 1937 national Land, and 1947 international boundaries. Inset: Greater Berlin. Scale: 1:199,000, showing French, British, American, and Soviet occupation zones. In lower left margin: "10655. February 1947". In lower right margin: "A-3420 (0)2++".
dct_creator_sm: United States. Department of State. Division of Map Intelligence and Cartography
dct_publisher_sm: [Washington, D.C.] : Department of State, Division of Map Intelligence and Cartography, 1947.
